title: Wide Spread Password Rejections?
body: So It seems like this is happening to others as well, anyone have any information or ideas as to what is happening?

replies.body:
Thanks for the heads up guys! We're aware that our [**authentication servers**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) are having a hard time letting people login and the poros are on the job!

....Wait.....maybe it was the poros who did this in the first place....-_-'
Sorry this have been happening to me as well, i thought i was banned or something. Can u tell me when is it gonna be fixed?
It should be all fixed up by now! If you still can't get logged in, go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into your account!
I cant send tickets cause i cant log in yet. lol why cant i log in guys? i really thought i was banned for some reason since i coulnt log in.

You can still submit tickets without logging in! 

The login server issues have all been ironed out at this point, but if you're still unable to log in then there's a chance that someone may have been able to gain access to your account without us knowing. I'd suggest hitting up our account team through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as you can to make sure your account is safe!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Q1wmxcKZ,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2017-05-14T23:04:43.546+0000)
>
> Thanks for the heads up guys! We're aware that our [**authentication servers**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) are having a hard time letting people login and the poros are on the job!
> 
> ....Wait.....maybe it was the poros who did this in the first place....-_-'

I knew it !
Poro conspiracy..

https://i.imgflip.com/1p17mu.jpg
If we were in a game and got kicked out for this, will we be penalized?
Happening, IDK, can't reset my password either bc thats down. I think they are having troubles.
yes it's happening to me too!
It happened to me in EUW, I can log in normally on website, but can't on client, maybe this a massage telling me to study for tomorrow's test!
Not sure if it matters but yeah happened to me as well....
Has this ever happened before? How long did it last if it did? rn all I want is to play some teemo. {{champion:17}}
I am starting to think this is some kind of conspiracy so that Ill spend time with my mom instead of playing, sneaky rito, sneaky
just wait till rito fixes it no one got hacked
What can i do, can't reset pass couse it's down as well.. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Same issue. Common Rito Let us play!
the same think is happening in Eune as well...
i dont know whats happening its happened to several diffrent areas too not just na thats all i know
